entities.name: madam pomfrey
entities.description: Madam Pomfrey is a nurse who is trying to peer into Harry's eyes. She mentions that Professor Lupin gave Harry some chocolate.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who has already had some chocolate given by Professor Lupin.

entities.name: professor lupin
entities.description: Professor Lupin is a Defense Against the Dark Arts teacher who gave Harry and others some chocolate.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is a teacher who asks Harry if he feels all right.

entities.name: miss granger
entities.description: Miss Granger is a student whose course schedule Madam Pomfrey wants to discuss with her.

relationships.description: Madam Pomfrey tries to peer into Harry's eyes.
Professor Lupin gave Harry some chocolate.
Madam Pomfrey wants to discuss Miss Granger's course schedule with her.
